Launcher.NewVersionIsAvailable: A new version is available, download now?
Launcher.ModUpdateAvailable: There are some mod updates available

Settings.CheckUpdates_Tooltip: Will ask you if you want to automatically download the latest Memoria from github when you press play
Settings.CameraStabilizer_Tooltip: Value of the delay between the player and the camera Makes the game smoother to play 0 disables the feature Recommended value: between 80 and 90
Settings.SkipIntrosToMainMenu_Tooltip: Skip logos and warnings to main menu
Settings.SkipBattleSwirl_Tooltip: On: battle start instantly (default) Off: slight delay before battles, like the original
Settings.HideSteamBubbles_Tooltip: Disable speech bubbles added by the FFIX 2016 re-release ('card', 'beach' and NPC interaction)
Settings.DisableCantConcentrate_Tooltip: Cheat: removes Garnet concentration malus (later in the story)
Settings.BreakDamageLimit_Tooltip: Cheat: removes the damage limit of 9999
Settings.BattleTPS_Tooltip: Base speed of battles, normal is 15
Settings.UsePsxFont_Tooltip: Selects the original PSX font (no install needed)
Settings.FieldFPS_Tooltip: Image refresh rate on normal backgrounds (default: 30)
Settings.WorldFPS_Tooltip: Image refresh rate on the world map (default: 20)
Settings.MaxCardCount_Tooltip: Limit to cards in inventory raised to 10000
Settings.NoAutoTrance_Tooltip: Trance does not start automatically. 'Left key' to activate it
Settings.FieldShader_Tooltip: Shader to be applied on characters outside of battles
Settings.BattleShader_Tooltip: Shader to be applied on characters and monsters in battle
Settings.EasyTetraMaster_Tooltip: TetraMaster: you win every card matchup
Settings.WorldmapMistPreset_Tooltip: Sets the distance and strength of the mist
Settings.WorldmapFOV_Tooltip: Field of view of the worldmap camera (default 44)
Settings.WorldmapBoost_Tooltip: Adds a slight field of view boost based on speed when flying (vanilla: off)
Settings.WorldmapShipTilt_Tooltip: Tilt the camera when you turn while flying (vanilla: on)
Settings.ExcaliburIINoTimeLimit_Tooltip: Removes the 10h time limit to receive Excalibur II
Settings.ViviAutoAttack_Tooltip: Instead of the normal physical attack, vivi uses a free base spell (the most effective of the 3)
Settings.AccessBattleMenuToggle_Tooltip: Make the main menu openable in battle, allowing you to change equipment and abilities
Settings.EasyJumpRopeMinigame_Tooltip: Jump rope minigame: each jump counts as 1000
Settings.UIColumnsChoice_Tooltip: Number of columns: if you want more items/abilities on one screen
Settings.EnableCustomShader_Tooltip: Whether to enable per-pixel lighting shader for field and battle character
Settings.SteamOverlayFix_Tooltip: Will patch the launcher for people having problems displaying the Steam overlay (Steam achievements also depend on it). Don't use it if the steam overlay is working.
Settings.SharedFPS_Tooltip: Display FPS (Frames Per Second). Original was between 15 and 30. Most screens display a maximum of 60 fps
Settings.Widescreen_Tooltip: Removes side bars when possible, shows a wider part of the backgrounds/worldmap/battles. Note: some backgrounds will still be displayed with black bars, as the original game did not have more pixels
Settings.Resolution_Tooltip: Screen resolution and image ratio. 16:9 recommended for widescreen
Settings.BattleInterface_Tooltip: Battle menu style: • Big (default) • Small: smaller • PSX-like: classic look and structure Customize it in-game with Alt+F1
Settings.WindowMode_Tooltip: • Windowed: run the game in a window • Fullscreen: Game takes the whole display • Borderless Fullscreen: Takes the whole display but as a windowed process
Settings.SpeedChoice_Tooltip: • Normal: default • Fast: no wait time • Turn-based: No wait time + no rush to act • Dynamic: everyone acts simultaneously
Settings.TripleTriad_Tooltip: • Tetra Master: FF9 card game (default) • Tetra Master (less random): FF9 card game with lower randomness • Tetra Triad: FF8 rules on a 4x4 board • Triple Triad: FF8 card game
Settings.WorldmapDistancePreset_Tooltip: Increases the view distance on the worldmap
Settings.PermanentCheats_Tooltip: Maximum everything (F5/F6/F7) (these cheats stay on your save and disable achievements)

SdLib.Caption: Patch SdLib.dll
SdLib.AreYouSure: Are you sure you want to patch SdLib.dll?
SdLib.SuccessBoth: SdLib.dll is successfully patched for both platforms.
SdLib.SuccessX64: SdLib.dll is successfully patched for the x64 platform only.
SdLib.SuccessX86: SdLib.dll is successfully patched for the x86 platform only.
SdLib.Fail: Unfortunately, we could not patch the SdLib.dll. Please share your version of this file.
SdLib.CannotRead: Cannot read audio sampling frequency from the file:
SdLib.CannotWrite: Cannot read audio sampling frequency from the SdLib.dll

SteamOverlay.Caption: Steam Overlay
SteamOverlay.FixAreYouSure:
Now we will install a hook into your OS that will launch FF9_Launcher.fix instead of the FF9_Launcher.exe file. In this case, all integrity checks of the Steam file will complete successfully. Thus, this will solve the problem that some users have periodically disabled Steam Overlay functionality, and related features: achievements and controller support.
However, be careful and DO NOT DELETE the game, its folder or the FF9_Launcher.fix file without first rolling back the changes. Otherwise, the hook will remain in your system, and after a new installation of the game, you will not be able to launch it. You can roll back the changes in the launcher or manually by running Memoria.SteamFix.exe in the game folder.
Are you sure you still want to continue?
SteamOverlay.RollbackAreYouSure:
Now we will remove the changes made, after which the problem with Steam Overlay will return.
This can lead to disabling achievements and controller issues.
Are you sure you want to continue?

ModEditor.Name: Name
ModEditor.Author: Author
ModEditor.IncompatibleWithMemoria: Mod version is incompatible with the current Memoria Update it from the mod catalog
ModEditor.ApplyModPresetText: Would you like to apply this mod preset?
ModEditor.UpdateTooltip: New version of this mod available in mod catalog:
ModEditor.TooltipMoveUp: Move Up/Right-Click to Move to Top
ModEditor.TooltipMoveDown: Move Down/Right-Click to Move to Bottom
ModEditor.TooltipCheckCompatibility: Check Mod Compatibilities/Right-Click to Check All
ModEditor.TooltipCancel: Cancel Current Download/Right-Click to Cancel All
